definition: surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: Frank, how about some bacon with your French toast ?
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克，弄点儿咸肉就着煎面包片儿吃好不好？

sentences.english: Frank consults his niece, Ann, about how to handle an insect invasion.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克向他的侄女安请教如何对付昆虫的侵害。

sentences.english: He was never at his ease with Frank.
sentences.chinese: 他跟弗兰克在一起总是感到很不自在。

sentences.english: It was from Shannon McDonald. cc: Frank Davis.
sentences.chinese: 新邮件来自夏侬麦当娜，并抄送了弗兰克戴维斯。

sentences.english: Why the long face, Frank?I've never seen you look so fed up.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克，为什么板着脸？我从没有看到你这样不高兴。

sentences.english: I grabbed Frank's arm and towed him toward the exit.
sentences.chinese: 我抓住弗兰克的手臂，拉着他往出口走去。

sentences.english: He had reached Randalls the evening before.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克是头天晚上到达兰多尔斯的。

sentences.english: Frank overhears th is, and Rick is forced to admit that Dan was killed.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克无意中听到了，里克被迫向他承认，丹被杀了。

sentences.english: Frank overhears this, and Rick is forced to admit that Dan was killed.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克无意中听到了，里克被迫向他承认，丹被杀了。

sentences.english: Frank began to panic as it dawned on him that they might be over.
sentences.chinese: 当弗兰克渐渐明白两人可能分手的时候，他开始发慌。

sentences.english: Bob was a plumber, and Frank was a cop.
sentences.chinese: 鲍步做水管工，弗兰克做警察。

sentences.english: Frankl's work has a great deal to say about many aspects of life.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克的著作大量论述了生活的各个方面。

sentences.english: Frank let out a yell and jumped away.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克大叫一声跳开了。

sentences.english: Frank is concerned that he doesn’t have the money for the drug deal.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克感到担心，因为他没有钱进行毒品交易。

sentences.english: Would you say that she was a moaner, Frank?
sentences.chinese: 你会觉得她是在呻吟吗，弗兰克？

definition: Pelé (1940-), Edson Arantes Do Nascimento, Brazilian football star
Michel or Mitchell (name)/George Mitchell (1933-), US Democratic party politician and diplomat, influential in brokering Northern Ireland peace deal in 1990s, US Middle East special envoy from 2009
